scenes.visuals: A video plays on a black screen. At the top, "Subtitles available!" is written in yellow, and "Subtítulos disponibles!" is written in white below it. There are flags for Great Britain, Portugal, Spain, France, Italy, and Germany underneath that. There is a video paused with the captions option highlighted.
scenes.audio: subtitles available. Subtítulos disponibles.

scenes.visuals: An array of flags are shown with arrows connecting them to a central blue and red flag. Portugal, Andorra, Spain, France, Italy, and Romania are all featured around a "thinking" emoji with a question mark.
scenes.audio: El o Interlingua, una lengua panrománica.

scenes.visuals: A large red X appears on the screen, with "NON!" written beneath it.
scenes.audio: Non.

scenes.visuals: A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Es possibile que habías audito parlare de una lingua clamata interlingua.

scenes.visuals: The flag of Interlingua (IALA) is shown with the name of the language written beneath it.
A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Artículos, comentarios de vídeos en línea sobre cuesta increíble lengua que conecta fácilmente las lenguas románicas.

scenes.visuals: A scene from a BBC news report is shown. Laura Garcia, a reporter from BBC News Mundo is shown, and her interview appears as a search result. The title of the video is shown, as well as the number of views and comments below it.
A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Que plus se pode perder? Bene, cuesto non è tutto. Plus específicamente para que iya una mala comprensión de lo que realmente lo interlingua.

scenes.visuals: Text on a yellow screen asks the question "QUE ÈST VERAMENTE LO INTERLINGUA?"
scenes.audio: Allora, que è veramente lo interlingua?

scenes.visuals: A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Lo Interlingua è una lingua ausiliare internazionale desveluta per la American International Auxiliary Language Association o IALA basata sobre las lenguas europeas populares atravieso de loro raíces griegas e latinas es compartitas e en minore mesura orígenes indoeuropeos.

scenes.visuals: A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Fu creato por essere una lingua pianificata artificiale che si assombrasce a las lenguas naturales rendendo la facilmente comprensible a prima vista.

scenes.visuals: The flag of Esperanto is shown, with "Esperanto" written beneath it.
scenes.audio: Questo è un contrasto con una lengua semejante, lo esperanto, che fu creato por essere una lengua facile de apprendere mais a lo costo de la intelligibilità instantanea.

scenes.visuals: A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: De plus, lo que distingue lo interlingua de lo esperanto fu una metodología científica che determinado su desvelutamento. La IALA ha usado cuatro lenguas principales de control para determinar su vocabulario e gramática.

scenes.visuals: On a white screen, a sentence written in a foreign language. "4 (QUATTRO) LENGUAS DE CONTROLLO".

The French flag is shown with "FRANCESE" written beneath it. Then, the Italian flag is shown with "ITALIANO" beneath it. Then, the Spanish flag and the Portugese flag are shown as a unit with "ESPANNIO/PORTUGESE" beneath them. The British flag is shown with "ANGLESE" written beneath it.
A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: En minore mesura, la IALA también a consultado las lenguas secundarias de control, lo alemanno el orusso.

scenes.visuals: The German flag is shown, with "ALEMANNO" beneath it. Then, the Russian flag is shown with "RUSSO" beneath it.
A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Secondo suo principio de internationalitate, lo alemanno el orusso se podrían substituir por una lengua principale. Allora ya vedemos que varias lenguas non románicas han influenciato lo interlingua, porque lo interlingua fu conceputo por la comunicación internazionale generale.

scenes.visuals: A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Non obstante, se entrar troppo en detalles, la maggiore parte del vocabolario malgrado la influencia de lenguas non románicas como lo anglese, terminado provenendo de lo latino clásico e de lenguas románicas.

scenes.visuals: An example of translation is shown, with the origin Latin word displayed at the top. On the left side, "Delgado" is written above the spanish flag, and "Slim Thin" is written above the British flag below that. On the right side, "Delicado" is written above the Spanish flag, and "Delicate" is written above the British flag below that.
scenes.audio: Por hacer un ejemplo, lo español a la palabra hereditaria delgado e lo préstamo latino delicato, cada uno con lo proprio significato.

scenes.visuals: A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Non obstante, cuando se trata de la gramática de lo interlingua, la historia è molto diferente. La metodología era tale che si estaba ausente una sola característica gramatical e la excluyeron.

scenes.visuals: The list of flags with checks next to them is displayed. The British flag has an x next to it.
A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Permette me essere claro. La gramática non fu determinada per la caratteristiche de la mayoría mas por lo denominatore comune de las características compartidas por todas las lenguas.

scenes.visuals: On a white screen, the words, "4 (òCTO) MòDOS FUNDAMENTALES" are displayed.
A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Secondo so principio de internationalitate, lo alemanno e lo russo se podrían substituer por una lengua principale. Allora, ya vedemos que varias lenguas non románicas han influenciato lo interlingua, porque lo interlingua fu conceputo por la comunicación internazionale generale.

scenes.visuals: Text on a black screen reads, "Plus sobre cuesto plus tarde..."
scenes.audio: Plus sobre cuesto plus tarde...

scenes.visuals: The words, "LO OBJEàCTIVO" are displayed with a target and an arrow through the center.
A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Ahora, comparemos lo interlingua con outro proyecto, lo Romanche Neolatino o semplicemente lo Neolatino. Lo Neolatino è una lengua panrománica, una lengua creada específicamente por unire las lenguas románicas.

scenes.visuals: An array of flags is shown with arrows connecting them to a central red and tan flag. Portugal, Andorra, Spain, France, Italy, and Romania are all featured around the central flag.
A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Cuesto significa que, a diferencia de lenguas como lo interlingua, una lengua internationale generale, lo Neolatino facilita la comunicación entre parlantes de solo lenguas románicas, cine una influencia significativa per parte de lenguas non románicas como lo anglese.

scenes.visuals: A flag split into blue, yellow, white, and red. Underneath reads, "Intereslavo Medžuslovjansky Медждусловјанскы".
The flag for Interslavic is shown above the words "Por lenguas eslavas". Below, the flag for Neolatino is shown with the words "Por lenguas románicas."
A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Secondo so principio de internationalitate, lo alemanno el orusso se podrían substituer por una lengua principale.

scenes.visuals: The array of flags with the words that describe them, "FRANCESE", "ITALIANO", "ESPANNIO/PORTUGESE", and "ANGLESE", and "ALEMANNO" and "RUSSO" at the bottom.
A screen shot of what the website Youtube shows.
A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Allora, lo obgetivo de lo Interlingua è plus generale, mentre che lo Neolatino fu creato solo por palantes de lenguas románicas.

scenes.visuals: The words "RESULTATO" are above the language flag layout seen earlier in the video. Every flag but that for Great Britain has a green check mark. The logo for the Interlingua has a red x above it.
A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: La metodología era tale che se estaba ausente una sola característica grammaticale e la excluderon. Permette me essere claro, la gramática non fu determinata per las caratteristiche de la mayoría, mas plu presto per lo denominatore comune de las características compartidas per todas las lenguas.

scenes.visuals: The words "4 (QUATTRO) LENGUAS DE CONTROLLO" are displayed on a white screen.
The words "LO VOCABULARIO" are displayed along with an image of an open book.
A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: En la major parte de los casos tanto lo interlingua tanto lo neolatino han parolas semejantes. Non obstante, loro obgetivos subjace de a diferencias notables. En primo loco, lo interlingua incluye muitas palabras de lo latino clásico que non se usan de lo tutto en lenguas románicas, como ighitur e sed.

scenes.visuals: The word "Latino: delicātus." is shown above a list comparing the language translation from Latin to other languages.
The word "Extra" is shown on the left of a screen, and the words "Ex" are shown on the right of it. Both are shown with a comparison of language translation from Latin to other languages.
scenes.audio: Por hacer un ejemplo, lo espagnolo a la palabra hereditaria delgado, e lo prestito latino delicato, cada uno con lo propio significato.

scenes.visuals: A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Non obstante, cuando se trata de la gramática de lo interlingua, la historia è molto differente.

scenes.visuals: The words "LA GRAMMÁTICA?" are displayed in white above a magnifying glass hovering above a piece of paper with grammar notes written on it.
A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: La gramática de lo interlingua è molto differente de quella de las lenguas románicas en octo modos fundamentales.

scenes.visuals: The words "1. LO GÈNERE" are written in black text on a yellow screen.
A chart showing "le matre e le patre" and "Un libro e un porta" translated into various languages.
scenes.audio: A lo interlingua le manca lo género grammatical dovuto a la influencia de lo Anglese. En interlingua, le matre e le patre, un libro e un porta.

scenes.visuals: The words "2. LA CONCORDANTIA GRAMMATICALE" are written in black text on a yellow screen.
A chart comparing interlingua with other languages.
scenes.audio: The flag for Interlingua is shown with the phrase, "Le libros es verde.". Also the British flag and the translation, "The books are green". Also the Neolatino flag and the translation, "Los libros son verdes."

scenes.visuals: The words "3. CONJUGATIONES VERBALES" are written in black text on a yellow screen.
The languages of interlingua compared to other languages.
scenes.audio: A chart comparing interlingua with other languages. "Jo canta", "Tu canta", "Ile canta", "Vos canta", "Illes canta", "Nos canta" are shown and contrasted with the english translations, which end in -s.

scenes.visuals: The words "4. LA ELIMINATIONE DE PRONOMES PERSONALES" are written in black text on a yellow screen.
Compares the wording for "PRONOMES PERSONALES" with two forms of Italian and translation in English at the bottom of the chart.
scenes.audio: A chart comparing the way "PRONOMES PERSONALES" are used in Interlingua versus Neolatino.

scenes.visuals: A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Per mette essere claro, la gramática de lo interlingua fu enormemente simplificada en comparasione con la gramática de lenguas románicas a causa de la influencia de lo Angrese.

scenes.visuals: A graph compares Interlingua to Romance Neolatino, using two different styles of presentation.
Text appears on the screen, "AD QUI IMPORTA?" and then a confused face is shown.
A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: Forse esteis pensando, ok, allora, porque è malo questo? La diffusione defectuosa de informazione sobre lo interlingua presenta una crise de identitate confusa con varias consecuencias. A sapere, è románico o non? Lo ponto acui è che cuesto pronomes son únicos a lo interlingua.

scenes.visuals: A young man with long brown hair and a beard speaks in front of a green screen.
scenes.audio: In questo è il stesso video è una prova, ho parlato in neolatino questo tempo, è complesso e ricco, come tutte le lingue e, d'accordo con i principi della lingua enunciato in un certo senso, è più un dialetto della propria lingua romanza in vez di essere una lingua artificiale.

scenes.visuals: A screen shot from the ecolingust's profile on youtube comparing Interlingua with Romance.
A chart comparing neolatino and interlingua and Interslavo.
scenes.audio: E sopra tutto alla gramática de lo interlingua fu enormemente simplificada in comparación con la gramática de lenguas románicas a causa della influenza dello anglese.

scenes.visuals: A screen says "INTERESLAVO" and "ROMANCE NEOLATINO" which then fade away.
